title: Italian Brainrot Obby Parkour
description: Italian Brainrot Obby Parkour is a wild and hilarious 2 player platforming experience that blends meme-fueled chaos with classic obby parkour mechanics. Inspired by games like Tower of Hell, this title brings the unpredictable humor of the Italian brainrot meme universe into a 3D climbing challenge. Available characters are: -Tung Tung Sahur -Brr Brr Patapim -Burbaloni Luliloli -Frigo Camelo -Girafa Celestre -Lirili Larila -Orangutini Annaucini -Tralalero Tralala -Vaca Saturno Saturnita
instructions: In Single Player Game mode: Move: W,A,S,D or ARROW KEYS Jump: SPACE Sprint: L-SHIFT Camera rotate: MOUSE Zoom in/out: MOUSE SCROLL In 2 Player Game mode: Player 1: Move: W,A,S,D Jump: SPACE Sprint: L-SHIFT Player 2: Move: ARROW KEYS Jump: L Sprint: K

title: Color Cargo Puzzle Rush
description: Color Cargo Puzzle Rush is the ultimate blend of color puzzle games, and sorting games! Dive into this stress-relieving world of ASMR games where you match delivery boxes with the right cargo buses by their colors. Perfect for fans of color sort puzzle and fun games, this game is all about strategy, speed, and precision.
instructions: Use mouse left button to play

title: Patterns
description: Help Ellie recreate magical patterns using grass, fire, clouds, and more elements as you uncover the hidden order of each level.
instructions: Click on a tile to place down the selected element. Click on an element icon to change the element. Click on a shape icon to change the shape. In Stretch Mode, you can stretch shapes by dragging the arrows.

title: Chicken Scream Race
description: Get ready for a wacky and challenging voice-controlled adventure in Chicken Scream Race! This unique game brings a hilarious twist to platform racing by letting you control your character with both taps and your voice. Whether you’re clucking quietly or screaming loudly, your chicken responds to the intensity of your sound, making each race a chaotic yet exciting experience.
instructions: Tap Mode: 1P Mode: Player 1: W or UP ARROW or SPACE 2P Mode: Player 1: W or SPACE Player 2: UP ARROW Voice Mode: 1P Mode: Make some noise to move the chickens. 2P Mode: Players should make noise in turn in order to move the chickens one by one.

title: Block Crasher
description: Block Crasher is a fun and fast-paced mix of classic Bubble Shooters, block-breaking games, and a bit of penalty shooting flair. Your goal is to launch colorful bubbles at moving blocks, match the colors, and score as many points as possible. It’s all about timing, precision, and quick thinking as the blocks keep shifting across the screen.
instructions: Aim and release to shoot bubbles at the moving blocks. Match colors to score and clear combos.

title: Kingdom Cats
description: Become friends with the King of Cats and build a whole kingdom together! Dive into a colorful, exciting world where you can fully demonstrate your creativity!
instructions: Your main task: Build a Kingdom! Tap the screen to make your residents build the city! Make improvements at every opportunity to speed up development! Make sweet waffles for workers so they mine more stones! Send builders to the mine to mine valuable ore! Process the mined stones and get jewelry from them! Pack all the loot into chests and send them for sale! Sell the loot as expensively as possible! Build new buildings and call new residents to get rich!

title: Build A Queen 2025
description: In Build a Queen 2025, you will embark on a fun journey to become a real queen. You will need to make your way through different platform levels with your opponents. Choose outfits, skin colors, and more according to your goals. Dress up in the most glamorous queen look, meet the prince, and win. You can collect money to unlock more dance steps.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Happy Blocks
description: Happy Blocks - Fun Puzzle Game for Everyone! ? Dive into the colorful world of Happy Blocks! Arrange and clear the blocks smartly to conquer challenging levels. Tap, move, and stack your way to the highest score! Can you solve them all?
instructions: Drag to move

title: Ping Pong Battle Table Tennis
description: Want to have an intense table tennis battle? In Ping Pong Battle - Table Tennis, you will become a ping pong pro and compete with your opponents in a fierce competition! This game combines realistic paddle manipulation with exciting match simulation.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Shoot Run Monster Hunting
description: Welcome to the interesting parkour world of Shoot Run: Monster Hunting! In this challenging game,you will be a brave shooter. Run, collect, fight and shoot all kinds of scary monsters, show your courage and skill! Enjoy running in a variety of scenarios, challenging speed and agility.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Fly Fly Fly
description: Fly Fly Fly is a Flappy Bird alike game, where you have to fly through 30 different levels, avoiding obstacles an collecting berries. If you hit the ground it will be game over, if you crash on one of the earth worms around the level, you will lose a life. If you lost all your lives, it's game over. You can restore your health collecting the berries you will find around the level. Do your best and beat all the 30 levels and show the world what you really are!
instructions: Tap or Click to fly

title: Rotate Rings - Circle Puzzle
description: Rotate Rings - Circle Puzzle: Twist Your Mind! Welcome to Rotate Rings, the ultimate circle puzzle challenge! Your mission is simple: rotate the rings to align the colors or images correctly. As you progress, the puzzles get trickier, testing your strategy and problem-solving skills.
instructions: Drag to rotation

title: Panda Lu Treehouse
description: Hey, animal lovers! Enter the enchanting world of Panda Lu's Tree House, a super fun casual simulator that will warm your heart. In this game, you play as the caretaker of the adorable panda Lu. Your adventure begins by building a magnificent tree house, a cozy and vibrant home for your furry friend.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cooking Stories: Fun cafe game
description: Become the host of the popular transformation cooking show — Cooking Stories! You are not just a chef, you are a culinary genius, a style master, and an interior designer. Participants come to you at their most desperate moment: they urgently need help — and only you can change and save their lives! But that’s not all... Take a peek behind the scenes of the TV show: intrigue, emotions, unexpected twists — all this in the game Cooking Stories!
instructions: With each new character, you will acquire a café or restaurant and their house or apartment, which will require your management and culinary skills. Manage the character and serve guests in a timely manner! Transform the appearance of each character and their home! Choose trendy makeup. Determine the appropriate style. Organize a stylish interior.

title: Table Tennis Open
description: Discover a casual, easy-to-play game for hours of endless fun. Face off against your opponent, bounce the ball as its speed increases, and aim for the highest score. Earn coins with each hit to upgrade your racket!
instructions: This classic table tennis game lets players bounce the ball to score points and earn coins for racket upgrades. As the game progresses, the ball's speed increases. Choose from 21 rackets and explore 5 unique environments, each offering its own challenges and excitement.

title: Rent out - Landlord Tycoon
description: In this captivating world of landlord games, you'll start with a modest property portfolio and a dream to become the ultimate real estate and house tycoon. Your goal is to buy, sell, and manage properties to maximize your profits and become a successful business and house tycoon in this rent game. Whether it's residential apartments, commercial complexes, or luxurious villas, it's your chance to be rich in this rent game.
instructions: Immerse yourself in the world of real estate Build & manage your property empire, from residential apartments to luxurious villas Collect massive rents in this rent game

title: High Heels Collect Run
description: Ready to begin a stylish running adventure in High Heels Collect Run! In this casual game, you’ll run through various fun environments. Stepping on heels can make you feel like a queen! Everyone loves to look perfect, and these heels will make you shine like a star!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Geometrix
description: Geometrix is a game about guessing the right shape. Defeat the enemies copying their shapes. When you collide with the evil shapes, if you have the same geometrical figure, you will destroy the enemy, otherwise you will lost a health point. Lost more than three points and it will be game over. Face over 40 levels, with increasing difficulty, enemies with up to 6 different geometric figures. You have to be fast and skilled to beat this game. Will you make it? If you want to know it, just try it!
instructions: Touch the buttons on screen to change shape

title: Catch The Pig
description: This is a casual elimination game. The main purpose of the game is to find three identical pigs, catch them, and collect all the pig collections!
instructions: This is a match-3 game. Find three identical items and they will be eliminated. The ultimate goal of the game is to find all the pigs!

title: Pool Merge Mania
description: Pool Merge Mania! Get ready for a wildly addictive twist on classic pool mechanics! In Pool Merge Mania, shoot balls into the arena and watch them bounce, collide, and merge into higher-level balls. But beware, you can only have 15 balls on the table. Tip: Fewer balls = more control. Merge them quick to stay in the game!
instructions: Shoot balls every few seconds into the game board. Balls of the same level merge into a new, higher-level ball! You can only have 15 balls on the table. keep it low to stay alive! Strategic shots and smart merges are your key to survival.

title: Feed me Monsters! Idle Battle
description: The fate of the world is in your hands. Will you rise to the challenge and become a beacon of hope in a land filled with darkness?
instructions: Prepare for an epic showdown against a diverse range of enemies! From ferocious beasts that lurk in the wilderness to grotesque mutants threatening humanity, each monster poses a unique challenge. Defeating these foes not only earns you coins and XP but also unlocks new abilities to enhance your combat prowess. Are you ready to embark on this thrilling adventure? Adapt your strategy and overcome every adversary to achieve victory and restore balance to the world!

title: SuStainable
description: As the watchful guardian of a prestigious museum, you're tasked with protecting the priceless artwork from eco-activists turned vandals. To succeed, you must scour the exhibition halls, gather clues, and apprehend the culprit in the act. Once apprehended, you'll conduct a tense interrogation to uncover the truth. Will you be able to find the incriminating paint bucket before the damage is done, or will the suspect's cunning and your own inexperience lead to a disastrous outcome?
instructions: WASD to move Left Click to Attack Right Click to show hints

title: Capybara Block Shot
description: Join the chillest capybara in a relaxing puzzle adventure! Merge number blocks, unlock high scores, and vibe your way to 2048 and beyond. Simple to play, soothing to master. Capybara Block Drop is your cozy brain break!
instructions: use mouse or touch to interact with in game element

title: Cube Speed Dash
description: Jump, dash, and survive in Cube Speed Dash, a high-speed arcade challenge where every second counts! Master lightning-fast reflexes as you guide a nimble cube through treacherous obstacle courses filled with spikes, traps, and deadly pitfalls. One wrong move—and it’s game over!
instructions: A: Move Left D: Move Right Space: Jump

title: Mini Games Relax Collection 2
description: Relax and take a mini-game tour! Mini Games: Relax Collection 2 brings you a series of casual and fun mini-games, designed for you to relax in your spare time! There are various types of games,each easy to play and extremely fun, allowing you to immerse yourself easily in the game world.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Italian Brainrot Find the Differences
description: In this game you have to locate the differences between the two pictures in the limited amount of time given to play each time! To play, use your mouse as control. Make sure that you don’t make a mistake more than three times because that will make you fail. One minute is the total time you will play through the 20 levels in this game! In each level you have seven differences. Good luck!
instructions: To find the differences use the mouse or touch the screen.

title: High Heel Design
description: Imagine you are a fashion shoemaker who produces the best high heels ever. In High Heel Design, you are in charge of fashion shoe design. Yes, what you produce is not sneakers, sandals, or boots, but high heels only! Unleash your creativity and combine elements to realize your own stunning high heels in this shoe-designing game.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Car Care Repair DuDu Mechanic
description: Car Care Repair DuDu Mechanic is a casual simulation game where you act as a skillful mechanic. Your clients meet diverse problems with their cars: broken windows, cracked car doors, flat tires, malfunctioning motors, lack of car parts...
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cop Run 3d
description: Cop Run 3D is an arcade-style parkour game that brings you on an exciting chase adventure! In this 3D game world, you'll play as a cop, running and jumping through the city streets. Avoid obstacles, and collect various rewards! The gameplay is simple yet fun. Use your agility to jump the fence, avoid spikes, and collect coins.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Kitkat Puzzle
description: Enter the world of Kitkat Puzzle, a captivating and intricate pin puzzle game where your strategic thinking and creativity are put to the test. The mission is straightforward - unlock kitkat holes to make these chocolate bars fall in the correct sequence. Sounds simple, yet with unlimited levels of varying complexity, it promises an intriguing brain-teasing journey.
instructions: Use the mouse to remove the kitkat on the table

title: Trading Games Playtime
description: Hey there, game lovers! Get ready to embark on an exciting journey with Trading Games Playtime, the ultimate casual game that's all about relaxation and non-stop fun! This game is a magical blend of various mini-games, making it a one-stop destination for your entertainment needs. First off, it doubles as a fantastic antistress simulator.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Gun Rush
description: Begin an action-packed gun battle runner. Gun Rush is an electrifying arcade game that combines gun merging with platform running. Run forward, avoid obstacles, collect weapons, and blast your way to the finish line with ultimate firepower. Control the direction of your gun, shooting power, ATK speed, and Range to increase its value. Increase your damage by using high-value doors.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: U Shape Puzzle
description: U Shape Puzzle is a unique and satisfying puzzle game where you tap on U-shaped blocks to slide them out — but only if the path is clear! Think before you tap, plan your moves, and remove every U block to finish the level. With simple one-touch controls and brain-teasing logic, this game is perfect for casual players who love puzzles with a twist.
instructions: Tap to unlock

title: Color Block Jam
description: Color Block Jam – an exciting puzzle game! Move the colored blocks, solve logic challenges, and complete levels. The game has many levels, from simple tasks to real brain teasers.
instructions: In this game, your goal is to move colored blocks and place them correctly to complete each level. But it’s not as easy as it sounds – you’ll face obstacles, limited space, and tricky puzzles that require focus and a strategic approach. Color Block Jam offers a wide range of levels with increasing difficulty. Every new challenge tests your skills: can you find the perfect solution using the fewest possible moves?

title: Powerwash Simulator - 3D Wash
description: There’s no stain too tough, no dirt too thick that you can’t handle. So gear up, point your washer, and get ready to bring the shine back to everything around you.
instructions: Take control of your very own high-powered pressure washer and immerse yourself in the satisfying world of deep cleaning. With a variety of objects and surfaces to clean, from patios to vehicles, your task is to restore them to their former glory. The thrill of watching layers of dirt and grime vanish under the powerful spray of your pressure washer is incredibly satisfying. So, are you ready to take on the ultimate cleaning challenge?

title: Capybara Block Drop
description: Capybara Block Drop is a fast-paced, brain-teasing puzzle game where merging numbers and staying calm under pressure is the key to survival. Drop numbered blocks into columns, combine matching tiles, and clear space with big combos. But watch out, if the board fills up, it’s game over, and your capybara buddy might just lose his cool! With colorful visuals and satisfying number-merging mechanics, Capybara Block Drop delivers endless strategic fun wrapped in a charming, lighthearted package.
instructions: - Click (or tap) a column to drop a block. - Match blocks with the same number to merge them - Use power-ups to clear blocks and stay in the game longer. - Plan ahead, game over when the board is full!

title: My Pet Care Salon
description: My Pet Care Salon invites you to run your very own pet spa! Groom, pamper, and style a variety of adorable pets with fun, interactive activities. From bath time and nail trimming to trendy haircuts and accessory styling, provide the best care for your furry clients. Manage your salon, meet different pets, and earn rewards as you create a welcoming environment for pets and their owners. Transform your pet care dreams into reality and become the ultimate pet stylist!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Sort Puzzle - Nuts and Bolts
description: Play Sort Puzzle - Nuts and Bolts, a free and addictive sorting game! Train your brain by stacking nuts of the same color. Simple yet challenging, it's the perfect casual game to relax and sharpen your logic skills. Play now and start sorting!
instructions: 1 step: Click/Tap on a bolt to select a nut. 2 step: Click/Tap on another bolt with the same color (or empty) to collect nuts. Use the hints if you get stuck: Cancel move - undoes the last step you made. Extra bolt - opens extra space for nuts.

title: Rope Sorting
description: In the game “Rope Sorting” you are waiting for exciting puzzles, where you need to sort the ropes. Pass an infinite number of levels, collect stars, use aids, be the first! Rollback actions - allows you to return to the previous step to take a different path. Adding a coil - makes it easier to pass a level by adding another empty coil.
instructions: The rules are simple: - Only the top rope and only one color can be taken per turn. - Select the desired spool, drop the ropes onto the empty spools. - Connect and combine ropes of the same colors. - Fill the spools. That's it!

title: Roller Coaster Rush
description: Speed through tracks in Roller Coaster Rush! Play free and online in this thrilling coaster game. Roller Coaster Rush is an exhilarating 3D game that puts you in control of a speeding roller coaster. Your goal is to accelerate through the tracks without crashing, performing crazy jumps and navigating steep drops. Hold to speed up and release to slow down just in time. Each level challenges your timing and precision as you rush through colorful and thrilling environments.
instructions: Hold Left Mouse Button / Space – Accelerate Release – Slow down

title: Super Dog Hero Dash
description: Super Dog Hero Dash is an interesting 3D running game with endless adventure and fun! You’ll become a brave dog hero running through a colorful city in this cartoonish world. Begin exciting challenges across various platforms!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Maze Escape Toilet Rush
description: What's the most urgent situation you can imagine? Of course, it is the last second of finding a toilet. In Maze Escape: Toilet Rush, you'll have a nervous and hilarious maze escape. Each level is a brand-new maze. You need to find the best route to the toilet quickly. Use your logic and intelligence to reach your destination successfully.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Coffee Craze - Sorting Game
description: Coffee Craze - Sorting Game is the ultimate café puzzle experience where your barista skills are put to the test! Sort colorful coffee cups, match drinks by type, and serve them quickly to satisfy every customer. With intuitive drag-and-drop mechanics, fast-paced levels, and delightful coffee-themed visuals, it’s the perfect blend of relaxing and brain-teasing fun.
instructions: Tap to move

title: Children Happy Farm DuDu
description: Hey there, little farmers in the making! Welcome to "Children Happy Farm DuDu"! This is an amazing casual simulator designed just for your kids. In this fun-filled farm world, you'll be the boss of your farm. The farm is full of cute animals like fluffy sheep, clucking chickens, and friendly cows. Your job is to take good care of them. Feed the animals, clean their shelters, and make sure they are happy.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: BURGER CATCH
description: Move the tray left and right to collect the ordered ingredients! If time runs out or you collect too many extra ingredients, you will lose hearts. If you run out of hearts, it's game over.
instructions: Drag left or right to move the tray.

title: I Am Security
description: Have you ever wanted to be a hardened security officer and be on the front lines of maintaining order? In I Am Security, an ultra-realistic role-playing simulator, you play the role of a professional security guard. You decide whether or not to allow them to enter. Some guests may try to sneak in with prohibited items and find these hidden items. Performs tasks in a variety of scenarios to identify suspicious persons.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Octopus Invasion
description: Dive into the ocean and control a hungry octopus on its journey to become the ultimate sea predator! Hunt fish, evolve new abilities, and unlock deeper, more dangerous zones in this addictive underwater adventure.
instructions: Move & Hunt – Swipe to guide your octopus and eat smaller sea creatures. Grow Stronger – Gain XP to upgrade stats like speed, tentacles, and stomach capacity. Evolve – Unlock powerful new forms by meeting stat requirements. Explore – Access new zones with unique fish and challenges. Complete Quests – Earn keys and rewards to progress faster. Use Gatherers – Deploy stingrays to automatically collect resources.

title: Supermarket Sort: Grocery Game
description: Sharpen your sorting skills, challenge your brain, and race against the clock in each level. With increasingly tricky puzzles and tons of grocery items to sort, the fun never stops!
instructions: Take on the role of a highly organized shelf-stocker, where your task is to categorize and arrange various groceries into tidy boxes. Each box should only contain items of the same type—be it fresh produce, packaged snacks, or beverages. Meticulous sorting is the key to success, as proper organization frees up more space. However, beware! As you progress in the game, you’ll face challenges with mixed groceries, confined space, and an expanding variety of items.

title: Pipe Puzzle: Connect & Flow
description: Pipe Puzzle: Connect & Flow – Relaxing Brain Teaser Connect the pipes, let the water flow, and solve hundreds of satisfying puzzles! Pipe Puzzle: Connect & Flow is a relaxing and addictive puzzle game where your mission is simple: fix the pipes and restore the flow of water. Perfect for all ages, it's the ultimate brain exercise you can play anytime, anywhere.
instructions: Rotate pipe pieces to connect them all Make sure the water flows from start to end Use hints when you get stuck Complete levels to unlock new challenges!

title: Stickman Jump
description: stickman run at full speed, control stickman jump to avoid direct collision. complete each challenging and difficult level
instructions: touch for jump
